name: Radiant Typhoon Fonix, the Great Flame
effectText: If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If a Quick-Play Spell Card is activated (except during the Damage Step): You can target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; shuffle them into the Deck. If "Mystical Space Typhoon" is activated while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Radiant Typhoon Fonix, the Great Flame" once per turn.
